mysteries.name: The Resurrection
mysteries.description: Jesus rises from the dead on the third day.

mysteries.name: The Ascension
mysteries.description: Jesus ascends into Heaven forty days after His resurrection.

mysteries.name: The Descent of the Holy Spirit
mysteries.description: The Holy Spirit descends upon the Apostles at Pentecost.

mysteries.name: The Assumption
mysteries.description: Mary is assumed body and soul into Heaven.

mysteries.name: The Coronation of Mary
mysteries.description: Mary is crowned Queen of Heaven and Earth.
